description:
Danny recaps this week's The Real Housewives of New Jersey, which featured a Nonno memorial and some Melissa/Joe stuff that was...something. On The Real Housewives of Dallas, the women bring in a Bigfoot expert for some reason? Unclear. After the Bravo talk, Danny chats with sitcom legend ðŸ‘‘Tia Mowry from Sister Sister and the current Netflix show Family Reunion! She gives us an update on the Sister Sister reboot, Twitches 3, working with Loretta Devine, and so much more!


RHONJ: 7:00ish

RHOD: 19:25ish

Tia Interview: 29:45ish


*To support this pod & access bonus episodes, visit Patreon.com/EverythingIconic
